title: Impact Originals Manufacturer Design Mrs. Claus Juniors Tunic Dress Shirt Red
features: Impact Originals Manufacturer Design Mrs. Claus Juniors Tunic Dress Shirt
description: This soft, slim fit crewneck juniors tunic t-shirt displays a unique design. This tri-blend tee is composed of polyester, cotton and rayon, for that soft and comfortable feel. This graphic print design is printed only on the front of the shirt. The printed image may be slightly faded or distressed. Picture is for clarity. Juniors tees are form fitting t-shirts intended for teens and slim women.
